item.title: AppLovin Stock Gets A Needham Upgrade – Why Does The Firm See A 33% Upside Potential For The Stock?
item.description: Needham said it observed strong performance in AppLovin’s e-commerce segment, particularly driven by its self-service advertising platform.

item.title: Apple Launches Updated AirTag With Longer Range, More Powerful Tracking, Building On Its Estimated Billion-Dollar Revenue Stream
item.description: The new AirTag also features a louder speaker for an improved ability to find the tracker.

item.title: Will The Fed Cut Rates This Week?
item.description: This is the Federal Open Market Committee’s first meeting in 2026, and comes after three consecutive 25-bps rate cuts.

item.title: TRAW Stock Slides In Volatile Session – What’s The Latest On Its Phase 2 Trial For COVID-19 Treatment?
item.description: The company announced the completion of enrollment in its Phase 2 trial of Ratutrelvir, an investigational oral antiviral for mild-to-moderate COVID-1...

item.title: INMD Stock Jumped Nearly 13% Today – What’s Powering The Rally?
item.description: According to a Calcalist report, the company is set to go private after a $1.1 billion acquisition by a fund.
